channel.title: Range bug delta rep++
channel.description: Not so sure where I would find this, so I decided to save some time and post here. When I start ranging and kill the monster while it is doing the death emote I hit once more with my arrow, and its hp bar refills but then it disappears. I know it isn't npchandler related.

item.title: Range bug delta rep++
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

Add something in where range is handled to check the hp. like.
if (npcHp == 0) {
attack = false;
Obv im not using what the methods would be in delta, im just saying how it could be handled.

Read full topic
